original_text: And it came to pass, when she saw that he had left his garment in her hand, and was fled forth,
korean_text: 그 여인이 요셉이 그의 옷을 자기 손에 버려두고 도망하여 나감을 보고

sentences.original_text: when she saw that he had left his garment in her hand,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 옷을 그녀의 손에 두고 갔다는 것을 그녀가 보았을 때,
